class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Finding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c80ff">Act </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span style="color:#c094ff">loss, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Third, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Expedition </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">"Golden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">Fleece" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8bcff">Finally, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">Golden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">Fleece </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p
